page.title: 07BIFFA WASTE SERVICES
page.content: Biffa waste services deal in{land {reclamation}which is the filling in of disused quarries with{crushed rubbish. When the quarry is full,that area is {covered}with{turf}and made into {pasture land}or just covered with{soil to make{arable land.}The rubbish comes from Doncaster,Rotherham,Sheffield and Worksop and is mainly{non hazardous {industrial waste.}The amout of{rubbish brought into the site is approximately {1000 cubic metres per day.}The rubbish is dumped straight from the lorries ready to be crushed. "Biffa" comes from the person who started the company 50 years ago. The company is {not local}as there are{22 branches}in Yorkshire and the main office is in High Wycombe. 14 people are employed at Finningley where there is an area of{157 acres to fill,}which working 6 days a week will take{25-26 years.}
